inclusion.criterion: Bloody diarrhea (by visual inspection) for no more than 36 hours prior to screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Detection of Shiga toxin (Stx1 and/or Stx2) in stool
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Hemolytic Anemia: hematocrit < 30% with evidence of hemolysis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Nephropathy: serum creatinine > Upper Limit Normal (ULN) adjusted for age and gender
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17 year old boy with vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite. Lab results show Hemoglobin: 9.7 g/dL, Platelet: 110,000 /cu.mm, Creatinine: 3.6 mg/dL.
